title: Royal Pakistan Navy (Extension of Service) Act, 1950
title_en: Royal Pakistan Navy (Extension of Service) Act, 1950
description: Official consolidated text of Royal Pakistan Navy (Extension of Service) Act, 1950 (XXIV of 1950) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title, and commencement
provisions.content:
_ (1) This Act may be called the Pakistan Navy
(Extension of Service) Act, 1950.
(2) It shall come into force at once

The Act has been___
(i) applied to Baluchistan, with effect on and from the 1st October, 1952, see Gaz. of P.,1952, Pt. I, p.168;
(ii) applied in the Federated Areas of Baluchistan, see Ibid., 1953, Pt. I, p. 152;
(iii) extended to the Leased Areas of Baluchistan, see the Leased Areas (Laws) Order, 1950 (G. G. O. 3 of 1950);
(iv) extended to the Baluchistan States Union by the Baluchistan States Union (Federal Laws) (Extension) Order, 1953 (G.G.O. 4
of 1953), as amended; and
(v) extended to the Khairpur State, see the Khairpur (Federal Laws) (Extension) Order, 1953 (G.G.O. 5 of 1953).
The Act has been and shall be deemed to has been brought into force in Gwadur with effect from the 8th September 1958, by the
Gwadur (Application of Central Laws) Ordinance, 1960 (37 of 1960), s. 2.

this section shall not exceed five years from the day on which his service would otherwise
